title: Did Elizabeth Holtzmann send Secretary of Homeland Security Kirsten Nelson a strong resignation?
subtitle: Former members of the Democratic Congress accused the Ministry of Internal Security of "waring against immigrants and refugees" in a letter published in July 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In July 2018, former Congresswoman Elizabeth Holtzmann wrote a letter of resignation from the Internal Security Advisory Council, which spread to social media.
